Posts.Content: shelby_85 wrote: hello. I have been having more tests done ( had lumpectomy done last October) They found another two areas in the ultrasound ( got copy same day). My question is difference between hypoechoic and isoechoic; also what "questionable through transmission means". When measuring a tumor does it go LxWxH? Any help would be appreciated. Posts.Title: Isoechoic/hypoechoic and through transmission shelby_85 shelby_85

Posts.Content: shelby_85 wrote: I have had a lot of testing since my lumpectomy last October. I am extremely confused and hope someone is able to assist. First on ultrasound I had two weeks ago; they found two areas of interest in left breast (1130&12); but the Mammo didn't pick up anything and the MRI only stated that there was diffuse and stippled background which has increased since last MRI. They also stated about a previously obscured mass on the right breast; but for the last two years there has been no mention of any mass or non mass enhancement on this side. Should I be asking in further about this? Didn't state size or anything. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Obscured mass shelby_85 shelby_85
